content: crocheted tape measure cozy ever have those scraps of leftover yarn and you hate to toss them yet don t know what you could possibly do with them well make yourself a little crocheted tape measure cozy-add a little flair to your project bag all pics are clickable materials mercerized cotton yarn i used omega sinfonia but this would work well with classic elite cotton tahki cotton king tut cotton - you get the picture this used a scant amount 4 25 mm hook and a 3 75 mm hook stitch marker tapestry needle 1 1/2 diameter round retractable tape measure dollar store sewing supply store wal-mart instructions sides-make two-using larger 4 25 mm hook chain 4 slip_stitch to first chain or use the magic magic_ring method work 6 single_crochet into ring-mark last single_crochet with a stitch marker round 1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around mark last with stitch marker 12 single_crochet round 2 *1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 in next single_crochet * around the stitch in the stitch marked with the stitch marker will always be an increase stitch-if it s not you miscounted move up stitch marker to last single_crochet 18 single_crochet round 3 *1 single_crochet in next two 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st * around 24 single_crochet round 4 *1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st * around 30 single_crochet round 5 1 single_crochet in each stitch around even no increases 30 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends your circles should each measure 2 ½ across at this point switch to 3 75 mm hook here with wrong sides of circles together single_crochet together in each stitch around until halfway closed add tape measure making sure the tape part is facing the unjoined area pull out a few inches of the tape measure here keep single_crochet around through both sides until you have two unworked stitches and the tape is still sticking out fasten_off and use tails from beginning of single_crochet and end of single_crochet around to stitch around the opening with your tapestry needle this will reinforce the opening where you pull out the tape measure weave in ends and voila-all done just squeeze the center where you started the ring to retract the tape have fun with it add some fancy trim around the side etc optional edging which i like the edging is a slip_stitch chain in same space 3 half_double_crochet in same stitch skip single_crochet single_crochet in next skip single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet in next around this pattern and all its contents are ©copyrighted
